programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A woman's French bulldog exhibits people aggression that started for no apparent reason when he turned two years old.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Life coach and fitness trainer Jillian Michaels can whip contestants on the "Biggest Loser" television series into shape, but she's at a loss when it comes to her dog; escape artist dog; dog dislikes brooms and windshield wipers.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two German shepherds who get along fine at home, but are at each other's throats when at daycare; a miniature schnauzer that barks when her owner's grandchildren visit.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar attempts to introduce Roscoe, an agoraphobic Akita who is too scared to leave the house and garden and has never been for a walk, to the outside world.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Weimaraner eats everything in sight; a yellow Lab's excess energy is expressed destructively; an Australian shepherd is unable to socialize with other dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Three canines with issues at a dog-friendly ad agency office; a border collie mix becomes excited and unresponsive to commands when in her owner's truck.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Velvet Revolver drummer Matt Sorum's French bulldog goes crazy at the sight of other dogs; Cesar helps a former therapy dog with aggression issues.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A woman who has relinquished the role of pack leader to her Welsh Sealyham terrier; an English mastiff with too much energy; a Tibetan terrier who is a terror on walks.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Great Dane with an aggressive attitude; Cesar helps a shepherd mix recover from the issues developed while living in a hoarding situation so she can be rehomed.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.sub-title: How to Raise the Perfect Dog
programme.desc: Cesar adopts four puppies and films them living with him and his pack for their first eight months to demonstrate how to raise a balanced dog.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive lab-mastiff mix; a Jack Russell mix that barks obsessively; a woman is concerned at her dog's habit of barking and growling at people.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Pekingese who refuses to eat or drink; a Chihuahua who bites people; two chow mixes who share a home but won't play nice with each other.

programme.desc: A woman's French bulldog exhibits people aggression that started for no apparent reason when he turned two years old.

programme.desc: Life coach and fitness trainer Jillian Michaels can whip contestants on the "Biggest Loser" television series into shape, but she's at a loss when it comes to her dog; escape artist dog; dog dislikes brooms and windshield wipers.

programme.desc: Two German shepherds who get along fine at home, but are at each other's throats when at daycare; a miniature schnauzer that barks when her owner's grandchildren visit.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A great Dane bites her owner; a bearded collie with dog aggression; a mouthy French mastiff.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Weimaraner is aggressive towards anyone who turns on one of the motorized bikes used to deliver the mail; an aggressive shar-pei; an Australian red cattle dog who barks incessantly.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two Chihuahuas who fight whenever they are in the same room; a dog who attempts to prevent his owner's boyfriend from leaving the house; a dog who is obsessed with moving water.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar revisits some of his toughest cases and explores the history or misunderstood dog breeds to dispel myths about aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.sub-title: A Dog and His Boy; Mobile Vet
programme.desc: Cesar comes the the aid of his good friend Dr Rick Garcia, a vet who is having trouble taming a terrier with epilepsy; Cesar helps a timid Rottweiler called Tank.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A close-knit community on Moorpar in California finds itself endangered by a collection of mischievous dogs, including three huskies.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to restore the peace between a Chihuahua mix and a Mastiff, and tackles an out-of-control pit bull puppy.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: When Susan MacDonald met Cobar, an Australian koolie dog, she thought it would be a match made in heaven, but she was wrong; a Shar-Pei mix is afraid of his own reflection.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A wheaten terrier mix is so attached to her owner that she won't leave his side; a shar-pei who is aggressive towards other dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An English Bulldog who is destroying her owner's house and aggressive towards their other dog; Howie Mandel's chihuahua is aggressive towards him and his wife.
